channel.title: Sacramento County|California|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Sacramento County|California|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 86
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 86 - I-5/Redding/Los Angeles. Continue east on I-80 for Reno (Nevada).

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 522
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 522 - I-80/San Francisco/Reno (Nevada). I-5 continues south to Los Angeles.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 522
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 522 - I-80/Reno (Nevada)/San Francisco. Continue south along I-5 to Los Angeles.

item.title: I-5 South - Entering Sacramento
item.description: Sacramento City Limit on I-5 south. Sacramento is the capital and the 6th largest city (according to 2010 census) in California.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 525B
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 525B - CA-99 North/Yuba City/Marysville.

item.title: I-5 South Approaching Exit 525B
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 525B - CA-99 North/Yuba City/Marysville. CA-99 joins I-5 south to downtown Sacramento.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 528
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 528 - Sacramento International Airport.

item.title: US-50 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-50 east. Distance to Cameron Park, Placerville, and South Lake Tahoe.

item.title: US-50 East - Exit 27
item.description: US-50 east at Exit 27 - E. Bidwell St./Scott Rd.

item.title: US-50 East - Exit 25
item.description: US-50 east at Exit 25 - Prairie City Road.

item.title: US-50 East - Exit 27
item.description: US-50 east at Exit 27 - E. Bidwell St./Scott Rd.

item.title: US-50/BL-80 West - Yolo-Sacramento County Line
item.description: US-50/BL-80 west at the Yolo-Sacramento County Line at the Sacramento River. Also entering the city of West Sacramento.

item.title: US-50/BL-80 West/CA-99 North - Exit 4A
item.description: US-50 West/BL-80 West/CA-99 north at Exit 4A - I-5 South/Los Angeles. I-5 North/To CA-99/Redding. CA-99 is marked as To CA-99 while is joins I-5 through Sacramento. Continue west on BL-80 (and US-50) to San Francisco.

item.title: BL-80/US-50 West/CA-99 North Approaching Exit 4A
item.description: US-50/BL-80 West/CA-99 north approaching Exit 4A - I-5 South/Los Angeles and I-5 North/To CA-99/Redding. Continue west on BL-80/US-50 for I-80 to San Francisco.

item.title: US-50/BL-80 West/CA-99 North at Exit 4B
item.description: US-50/BL-80 West/CA-99 North at Exit 4B - Downtown/10th St. Approaching Exit 4A - I-5/CA-99 North/Los Angeles/Redding.

item.title: US-50/BL-80 West/CA-99 North - Exit 5
item.description: US-50/BL-80 West/CA-99 North at Exit 5 - 16th St. Approaching Exit 4B - Downtown/10th St.

item.title: BL-80 West at US-50 on Exit 6A Ramp
item.description: BL-80 west at US-50 on Exit 6A ramp. Merge left for US-50 east towards South Lake Tahoe. Merge right for BL-80 towards I-5 and San Francisco.

item.title: BL-80 West at US-50 and CA-99
item.description: BL-80 west at Exits 6A and 6B. Exit 6A is BL-80 West/US-50/To I-5/South Lake Tahoe/San Francisco. Exit 6B is CA-99 South/Fresno.

item.title: BL-80 West at Exit 6C - Approaching Exit 6A and 6B
item.description: BL-80 west at Exit 6C - P St. Approaching Exits 6A - US-50 East/BL-80 West and Exit 6B - CA-99 South.

item.title: BL-80 West - Exit 7A and Exit 6C
item.description: BL-80 west at Exit 7A - J St. Approaching Exit 6C - P St.

item.title: BL-80 West at Exit 7B - Approaching Exit 7A
item.description: BL-80 west at Exit 7B - E St. Approaching Exit 7A - J St.

item.title: Exposition Blvd. east at BL-80 Onramp
item.description: Exposition Blvd. east at BL-80 west Exit 9A onramp.

item.title: Exposition Blvd. west at BL-80
item.description: Exposition Blvd. west approaching BL-80 west onramp to Fresno and San Francisco.

item.title: BL-80 West - Exit 9A
item.description: BL-80 west at Exit 9A - Cal Expo.

item.title: BL-80 West - Exit 9A
item.description: BL-80 West at Exit 9A - Cal Expo.

item.title: BL-80 West - Exit 5
item.description: BL-80 west at Exit 5 - CA-160/Downtown Sacramento.

item.title: BL-80 West - Exit 10A
item.description: BL-80 west at Exit 10A - Arden Way

item.title: BL-80 West - Exit 9B
item.description: BL-80 west at Exit 9B - CA-160/Downtown Sacramento. Use left lanes for BL-80/CA-99/US-50.

item.title: BL-80 West - Exit 10B
item.description: BL-80 west at Exit 10B - El Camino Ave/Carmichael.

item.title: BL-80 West - Exit 11
item.description: BL-80 west at Exit 11 - Auburn Blvd./Marconi Ave.

item.title: BL-80 West - Exit 12
item.description: BL-80 west at Exit 12 - Fulton Ave.

item.title: BL-80 West - Exit 14A
item.description: BL-80 west at Exit 14A - Auburn Blvd.

item.title: BL-80 West - Exit 14B and Exit 14A
item.description: BL-80 west at Exit 14B - Watt Ave. Approaching Exit 14A - Auburn Blvd. This is the first exit on BL-80 westbound after the I-80 split. BL-80 continues west towards Sacramento as the Capitol City Freeway.

item.title: I-80 West at Business Loop I-80
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 95 - BL-80/Capitol City Freeway/To CA-99/Sacramento. Also the first exit on BL-80 west, Exit 14B - Watt Ave. is signed. Continue west on I-80 for I-5 and San Francisco.

item.title: I-80 West Approaching Capitol City Fwy
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 95 - BL-80/Capitol City Freeway/To CA-99 South/Sacramento. The first exit on BL-80 west is also signed, Exit 14 - Watt Ave. Continue on I-80 west for I-5 and San Francisco.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 96
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 96 - Madison Ave

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 98
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 98 - Greenback Lane/Elkhorn Blvd.

item.title: I-80 West Approaching Exit 98
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 98 - Greenback Lane/Elkhorn Blvd

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 100
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 100 - Antelope Road

item.title: US-50 West - Exit 23
item.description: US-50 west at Exit 23 - Folsom Blvd

item.title: US-50 West - Exit 25
item.description: US-50 west at Exit 25 - Prairie City Road.

item.title: US-50 West - Exit 27
item.description: US-50 west at Exit 27 - Scott Road/E Bidwell St

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 93
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 93 - Longview Drive. Approaching Exit 94B - Auburn Blvd. I-80 continues east to Reno.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 92
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 92 - Winters St.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 91
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 91 - Raley Blvd./Marysville Blvd.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 90
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 90 - Norwood Ave.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 89
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 89 - Northgate Blvd.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 88
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 88 - Truxel Road

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 86
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 86 - I-5/CA-99/Sacramento/Redding. I-80 continues east to Reno.

item.title: I-80 East Approaching Exit 86
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 86 - I-5/CA-99/Sacramento/Redding.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 85
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 85 - West El Camino Ave.

item.title: I-5 North at CA-99/Yuba City Exit
item.description: I-5 north at CA-99 North/Yuba City/Marysville. Overhead approaching Sac. Intl. Airport, and I-5 to Woodland and Redding.

item.title: I-80 West Exit 95
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 95 - BL-80/To CA-99 South/Capitol City Freeway/Sacramento Exit on I-80 West. I-80 overheads to San Francisco and I-5.
